wikipedia_page.main: Courtney Duffus (born 24 October 1995) is an Irish footballer who plays as a forward for EFL League One side Morecambe. He is a former Republic of Ireland U21 international.

response: From 2016 to 2018, Watson was in a relationship with fellow tennis player Lloyd Glasspool. Since late 2019, she has been in a relationship with Morecambe footballer, Courtney Duffus.
